instruction: Create a list of steps to prepare a vegetable soup.
output:
• Gather vegetables, stock, salt and pepper, and other seasonings to use for the soup.
• Chop vegetables into cubes or slices. 
• Heat a pot or stock pot over medium heat and add oil or butter.
• Sauté vegetables until softened.
• Add stock and bring to a simmer, then reduce heat to low.
• Add seasonings and simmer for a few minutes. 
• For a smooth soup, use a handheld blender to puree soup until desired consistency is achieved.
• Check seasoning and add more if needed.
• Serve soup in bowls and feel free to top with garnishes such as herbs, croutons, or Parmesan cheese.
